Entries.default: "The rays of his countenance bathe the world, bringing an end to the night, ushering in the day!"
"Kneel before him and wonder at his benevolence, feel the warmth of his radiant presence."
"Behold, Eothas is risen again! He is glorious in form and purpose!"
"Eothas, light of spring, sun of the world, thou givest me life and purpose."
"Woe to those who labor in the shadow, for nothing is hidden from Eothas' divine sight."
"Gaun's sickle comes for us all, yet his light shines brightest for those who embrace him."
"Gaun shepherds us all, traveler. Seek out his temple along the Sacred Stair, that thy path shall be made clear."
